segments.text: I notice the overflowing sink first thing, what a shock.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water just pouring out, no one's turning it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, drying her plate calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's on, but she's blind to the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I spot the boy on the stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open, and he's grabbing a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping though, that stool doesn't look safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by waiting below, all excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on the cookies, ignoring the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a quiet garden, sunny and nice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing fast; someone could slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a wild scene unfolding here.
segments.speaker: PAR
